description: A metal clip that, when attached to the side of a pistol, allows its owner to carry it inside the wasteband of their pants, removing the need for a holster.  Can also be clipped to one's belt or in a similar location.

variants.description: A thin metal clip coupled with a strip of superadhesive paper.  Attaching it to the gun allows the user to clip it to one's pants, belt, or a similar mounting point, removing the need for a holster.  Though by no means a safe method of carry, you can use it to free your hands while scavenging or fighting.  <variant:black>
